content.raw:
This looks good to me, and is necessary for the laser scans to be displayed properly in rviz. I think it will work best when the `ihmc_valkyrie_ros` package is updated and the following valkyrie controller tarball is used:

* https://http://gazebosim.org/distributions/srcsim/valkyrie_controller.0.9-support.20170503.2c47c9a9bd999.tar.gz
content.html:
This looks good to me, and is necessary for the laser scans to be displayed properly in rviz. I think it will work best when the ihmc_valkyrie_ros package is updated and the following valkyrie controller tarball is used:

  • https://http://gazebosim.org/distributions/srcsim/valkyrie_controller.0.9-support.20170503.2c47c9a9bd999.tar.gz
